channel.title: Double Pipcast
channel.itunes:author: Double Pipcast
channel.description: Double Pipcast is a show dedicated to everything "Transformers TCG"

item.title: Transformers TCG Intro!
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam and Dave introduce themselves on the first episode of the Double Pipcast. Cam gives new players a rundown on what the TF TCG is all about!
item.itunes:summary: Cam and Dave introduce themselves on the first episode of the Double Pipcast. Cam gives new players a rundown on what the TF TCG is all about!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: SDCC Cards!
item.itunes:author: Double Pipcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam flys solo into SDCC card territory. Touching on Omnibots, Soundwave v Blaster, and Wave 4's covert announcement
item.itunes:summary: Cam flys solo into SDCC card territory. Touching on Omnibots, Soundwave v Blaster, and Wave 4's covert announcement
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Introducing Aaron - Playing 1 v 1 Over Audio?
item.itunes:subtitle: Aaron aka BRKNSTR joins the Double Pipcast! We weave in TCG talk in between some casual play!
item.itunes:summary: Aaron aka BRKNSTR joins the Double Pipcast! We weave in TCG talk in between some casual play!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Trippin' over Trypticon
item.itunes:subtitle: WotC announces Wave 4 - Trypticon is for big spenders - Loot Crate delivering damaged goods? Cam is left to his own devices, and talks about what's new in the world of the Transformers TCG
item.itunes:summary: WotC announces Wave 4 - Trypticon is for big spenders - Loot Crate delivering damaged goods? Cam is left to his own devices, and talks about what's new in the world of the Transformers TCG
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Ratrod and Hotbat
item.itunes:subtitle: The drip feed for Wave 4 Siege II reveals is real. The team at TF TCG dropped two reveals last week with Ratbat and Hotrod. Cam tries his hand at amateur sound effects for bumpers, and introduces a new segment called "Let's Talk A Bot It"
item.itunes:summary: The drip feed for Wave 4 Siege II reveals is real. The team at TF TCG dropped two reveals last week with Ratbat and Hotrod. Cam tries his hand at amateur sound effects for bumpers, and introduces a new segment called "Let's Talk A Bot It"
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Interview with WotC's Drew Nolosco
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam interviews Global Brand Manager of the Transformers Trading Card Game, Drew Nolosco. We touch on Drew's history in the gaming industry, the TF TCG development process, and what the future holds for the game. Take a peek behind the energon curtain!
item.itunes:summary: Cam interviews Global Brand Manager of the Transformers Trading Card Game, Drew Nolosco. We touch on Drew's history in the gaming industry, the TF TCG development process, and what the future holds for the game. Take a peek behind the energon curtain!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: The Secret of Omega Supreme?
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam dives into the biggest promo card the Transformers TCG has seen, Omega Supreme. What's this card about and what cards lend themselves to making him less meh?
item.itunes:summary: Cam dives into the biggest promo card the Transformers TCG has seen, Omega Supreme. What's this card about and what cards lend themselves to making him less meh?
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Talking Siege II - Introducing Shawn!
item.itunes:subtitle: Introducing a new member to the Double Pipcast crew, Shawn! Shawn and Cam talk about Siege II bots, Shawn's 30 years of TCG experience, and the Energon Invitational in December.
item.itunes:summary: Introducing a new member to the Double Pipcast crew, Shawn! Shawn and Cam talk about Siege II bots, Shawn's 30 years of TCG experience, and the Energon Invitational in December.
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Weaponizers in Siege II! - Introducing Brandon!
item.itunes:subtitle: Introducing a new member to the Double Pipcast crew, Brandon! Brandon dives into his experience as an owner/operator of a local game store, plus our thoughts on Weaponizer Six-Gun and Brunt!
item.itunes:summary: Introducing a new member to the Double Pipcast crew, Brandon! Brandon dives into his experience as an owner/operator of a local game store, plus our thoughts on Weaponizer Six-Gun and Brunt!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Mercenaries Shown @ NYCC
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam touches on the exciting reveal of a new faction in Transformers: The Trading Card Game. Submit your questions for Drew Nolosco of WotC for episode 11 of the Double Pipcast @DPipcast
item.itunes:summary: Cam touches on the exciting reveal of a new faction in Transformers: The Trading Card Game. Submit your questions for Drew Nolosco of WotC for episode 11 of the Double Pipcast @DPipcast
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: WotC Drew Interviewin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
item.itunes:subtitle: Drew Nolosco, Global Brand Manager of the Transformers Trading Card Game returns! We talk about Siege II, the Energon Invitational at PAX Unplugged, and recycling!
item.itunes:summary: Drew Nolosco, Global Brand Manager of the Transformers Trading Card Game returns! We talk about Siege II, the Energon Invitational at PAX Unplugged, and recycling!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Suppress the Press
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam, Brandon and Shawn celebrate the ban of Press The Advantage! The crew also talks about some of the new characters announced in the past week.
item.itunes:summary: Cam, Brandon and Shawn celebrate the ban of Press The Advantage! The crew also talks about some of the new characters announced in the past week.
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Energon Edition Pt. 1
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam, Brandon and Shawn discuss the necessity of bad cards, and the week-long tease of a new mystery TF TCG product
item.itunes:summary: Cam, Brandon and Shawn discuss the necessity of bad cards, and the week-long tease of a new mystery TF TCG product
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Energon Edition Pt. 2
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam, Brandon and Shawn discuss the ENERGON EDITION and the first full week of play post-Siege II launch
item.itunes:summary: Cam, Brandon and Shawn discuss the ENERGON EDITION and the first full week of play post-Siege II launch
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Multiple Missions
item.itunes:subtitle: Brandon hosts & the crew discusses how a competitive environment can compound a TCG barrier-to-entry. Another card bites the dust with the most recent ban.
item.itunes:summary: Brandon hosts & the crew discusses how a competitive environment can compound a TCG barrier-to-entry. Another card bites the dust with the most recent ban.
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Champ Inteview 1/3 - Interview with Dan Arnold
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam is joined by the Champion of the 2019 Transformers Trading Card Game Energon Invitational! Dan talks best practices for new players and hardened competitors. Check out zoeshouserescue.com, a charity that Vector Sigma is supporting!
item.itunes:summary: Cam is joined by the Champion of the 2019 Transformers Trading Card Game Energon Invitational! Dan talks best practices for new players and hardened competitors. Check out www.zoeshouserescue.com, an animal welfare group and charity that Vector Sigma is supporting!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Champ Interview 2/3 - Interview with Steffon Pinckney
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam is joined by Steffon Pinckney, winner of the TF TCG tournament at Origins 2019, and PPG Ohio 2019! Check out Steffon's channel DEF TF and look forward to his upcoming podcast "Champ Camp", where all of the past TF TCG champs come to chat!
item.itunes:summary: Cam is joined by the Steffon Pinckney, winner of the TF TCG tournament at Origins 2019, and PPG Ohio 2019! Check out Steffon's channel DEF TF and look forward to his upcoming podcast "Champ Camp", where all of the past TF TCG champs come to chat!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Champ Interview 3/3 - Interview with Kevin Allen
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam is joined by Kevin Allen, winner of the TF TCG tournament at Gen Con 2019! We discuss the 2019 Energon Invitational, building decks based off of your favorite characters / play style, and having FUN!
item.itunes:summary: Cam is joined by Kevin Allen, winner of the TF TCG tournament at Gen Con 2019! We discuss the 2019 Energon Invitational, building decks based off of your favorite characters / play style, and having FUN!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: We're Back! 2019 Recap
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam, Brandon, and Shawn are back together for the first episode of 2020! Foil battle cards, and a recap of 2019!
item.itunes:summary: Cam, Brandon, and Shawn are back together for the first episode of 2020! Foil battle cards, and a recap of 2019!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Titan Masters Attack! PPG Orlando Experience
item.itunes:subtitle: WotC announces Wave 5 of the Transformers TCG! We talk about ALL the juicy info that came from this week's reveal. Brandon also shares with us his experience from the first major TF TCG event of 2020.
item.itunes:summary: WotC announces Wave 5 of the Transformers TCG! We talk about ALL the juicy info that came from this week's reveal. Brandon also shares with us his experience from the first major TF TCG event of 2020.
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Interview with Competive Player David B. - All2Easy HIJACKS the Pipcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Team All2Easy play a secret action HIJACK and drop this interview with competitive Transformers TCG player David B. They do a deep dive on the Demolisher, Barrage, Lionizer, Vanguard Orange/Black deck!
item.itunes:summary: Team All2Easy play a secret action HIJACK and drop this interview with competitive Transformers TCG player David B. They do a deep dive on the Demolisher, Barrage, Lionizer, Vanguard Orange/Black deck!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Titan Masters Attac.. But They Also Protec
item.itunes:subtitle: The crew assembles to talk about all of the new Titan Masters Attack info! New mechanics, new battle cards, new characters. So much content we couldn't fit it in one episode!
item.itunes:summary: The crew assembles to talk about all of the new Titan Masters Attack info! New mechanics, new battle cards, new characters. So much content we couldn't fit it in one episode!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: TOP Titan Masters!
item.itunes:subtitle: Wreckers, Dinobots, Specialists OH MY! Cam and crew assemble to talk about their most anticipated characters from Titan Masters Attack, wave 5 of the Transformers TCG. Also, will the current crisis affect TF TCG events?
item.itunes:summary: Wreckers, Dinobots, Specialists OH MY! Cam and crew assemble to talk about their most anticipated characters from Titan Masters Attack, wave 5 of the Transformers TCG. Also, will the current crisis affect TF TCG events?

item.title: Talking with Wizards Drew: The Threequel
item.itunes:subtitle: Drew returns to the Double Pipcast to divulge more of Wizards of the Coast's runic secrets! How else do you explain Strategems!?
item.itunes:summary: Drew returns to the Double Pipcast to divulge more of Wizards of the Coast's runic secrets! How else do you explain Strategems!?
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Strategems are truly, truly, truly OUTRAGEOUS
item.itunes:subtitle: WotC reveals two new Stratagems that give a boost to the Bots & Cons, so of course we had to discuss it!
item.itunes:summary: WotC reveals two new Stratagems that give a boost to the Bots & Cons, so of course we had to discuss it!
